arStrings.szText: Mercenaries trade their loot against  {icon:Icon_RewardMat_PaleMark, 2.4} {c_highlight}Pale Marks{/c}. You can earn {c_highlight}Pale Marks{/c} by gaining Mercenary {c_highlight}Rapport{/c} and by completing events with a Mercenary.
Mercenaries will {c_highlight}Barter{/c} their loot in exchange for {c_highlight}Pale Marks{/c}.
Unlock {c_highlight} Bartering Upgrades {/c} by gaining {c_highlight}Rapport{/c}, and Mercenaries will look out for specific loot. The more you unlock, the more loot will be offered.
